extendedInfo.description: **Please note ** The most up to date version of this app is available here: http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zombiesurvivalyoudecidefreeA choose your own adventure game where you have to try to survive the zombie apocalypse. You make the decisions that will keep you alive or get you eaten by a flesh eating zombie. The walking dead can spring up from anywhere and you need to have your wits about you. Will you stay away from the undead long enough to survive and make it to the extraction point? Will you get your brains eaten by the walking dead? With no survival guide you will have to fight a war against the undead using your instincts.You Decide games are tongue in cheek adventure stories that give you a chance to decide the outcome of the story, putting you in the heart of the action. They have a sarcastic humour/humor to them and could be seen as offensive if you are sensitive that way. This free app contains the first three chapters of this story..Here is what you can expect:Chapter One - The undead uprising starts and you have to escape the cityChapter Two - You have to get your way out of the zombie infested woodsChapter Three - The walking dead chase you into a theme park, but can you keep it safe?Zombie Survival Premium, containing all six chapters is also available on Google PlayIf you love watching The Walking Dead, Night of the Living Dead, Dawn of the Dead, Shaun of the Dead or pretty much any blood soaked zombie adventure you will enjoy Zombie Survival You Decide.You Decide games are text based, low tech games which will probably last about 10 minutes. They won't change your life but will hopefully give you a laugh while you are playing them. Check out my other apps for similar types of games.Keywords: Zombie survival, walking dead, undead, adventure, choose your own adventure, you decide, story, andromo, funny, sarcastic, choose your fate, choice,living dead,walkers,zombie apocalypseThis application uses Google analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Software works. No bugs. But its poorly written. Narrative sucks. Not very interactive. Only one ending.
reviews.author: Woodrow Johnston

reviews.title: Bullshit
reviews.comment: When you get to the secound question on the first chapter  it only moves to the next when you tap the wrong solution then it tells you the scenario  ending with \"GAME OVER.\"  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Zyaira Boyd

reviews.title: Baaaad
reviews.comment: Poorly made, I could do it better. Most of the endings are the same and some don\'t even make sense. The only thing about it that made sense is that this app is free.
reviews.author: Josh Deland

reviews.title: Full of judgemental adolescent thinking...
reviews.comment: Once I read the part about \"fatty\", I had to uninstall it. Stereotyping minimizes peoples worth, even if it just a story.
reviews.author: Patricia Roysdon

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: This is beyond lame. Everything is pointing to sex one way or another. For a text based game it is even worse. It is full of spelling and grammar mistakes. This looks like it was written by a 14 year old boy between spank sessions.
reviews.author: Ryal Deveau

reviews.comment: The narration is just ridiculous, this feels more like a comedy than a zombie apocalypse.\tNot that good.
reviews.author: Nemesis Le

reviews.title: Um..
reviews.comment: The story is dry, and well just to focused on getting laid. If this is game is about survival then sex shouldn\'t be so reoccurring. Needs done developmental help and some descriptive reallocation. Good intentions poor execution.
reviews.author: Eric Valdez

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Half the buttons dont work. I had no choice but to head into the basement and die.
reviews.author: Brandon Musgrove

reviews.title: Good for a while gets boring
reviews.comment: Pretty good over all Woah there was more maybee interactive gets kinda boring but fun overall
reviews.author: Nick Serviss

reviews.title: Silly and fun
reviews.comment: Some typos but a fun way to kill a bit of time. People seem to take things way to seriously some times...
reviews.author: Rachel Cassidy-Cree

reviews.title: Not good at all
reviews.comment: Very buggy, narratives were utterly terrible and poorly written, descriptions of actions made by and toward the character were sadly generic. The writer lacked an extensive vocabulary and thus ruined the fun with constant draught. Overall, 1 star for poor quality, hardly entertaining at all.
reviews.author: Michael Kelly

reviews.title: Lame!
reviews.comment: This is the worst app I\'ve ever seen! Terms like \"fatty\" tell me whoever wrote this shallow and judgemental. On top of that, the constant mention of sex tells me that they are an immature little kid who needs to grow up. Do not download this app! Also, do not believe a word of all the reveiws saying this app is good. They are all put there by the dev.
reviews.author: Jeff Kinion

reviews.comment: I  love this game I strongly advise  to get premium
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: I thought it would have been good, but most of the game it will only let me pick the ones that will get me killed.
reviews.author: Angela Delamor

reviews.title: 2 pages in & it stalls.
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me get past the second page so I\'ve no idea the storyline. Not worth the space. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Howell

reviews.title: d
reviews.comment: sick people have written this, this is SO bad i wish i could rate it -5, just WTF.

reviews.title: uhmmm
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t get passed the second choice on the first chapter... it wouldn\'t work for me no matter how many times I try.
reviews.author: Mickaela Michaud-Collier

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Has potential but needs a lot of work. Some options didnt even work. Lame
reviews.author: Aven Olko

reviews.title: Zombie kill
reviews.comment: I their funny in the end but ends up getting me killed.
reviews.author: Darryl Mathis II

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Im playing this and Im like, the game is over because my group of people or friends or whatever doesnt like my choices. Its not about if these people like my choices. Its about how to survive...so dumb.
reviews.author: Candy Canes
